genre_description: A historical drama with speculative steampunk and early-digital elements, centered on themes of art, social class, and romantic tragedy.

ai_characters.name: Marie's Companion
ai_characters.description: A discrete, sophisticated device that monitors Marie's health, provides logistical information, and manages her complex social life.

ai_characters.name: Jean's Companion
ai_characters.description: A device inherited from Jean's father that provides artistic critiques, manages commissions, and monitors Jean's deteriorating mental state.

ai_characters.name: Émile
ai_characters.description: Pierre Revel's high-end assistant, focused on business efficiency and status-appropriate communication.

ai_characters.name: Claudette's Assistant
ai_characters.description: A simpler, brass-cased model focused on domestic tasks and community coordination.

behaviors.description: Monitors Marie's heart rate and stress levels, offering calming protocols and identifying emotional distress.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate is dangerously elevated. Shall I activate calming protocols?

behaviors.description: Provides detailed logistical and safety data to help a provincial girl navigate 19th-century Paris alone.
behaviors.quote: Scanning available options. Recommendation: Pensione Dubois, Latin Quarter. Proprietress speaks provincial French.

behaviors.description: Provides artistic critique and historical context to help Jean improve his painting technique.
behaviors.quote: Try the scumble technique for the skin tone—it will give you the texture you're seeking.

behaviors.description: The two AIs communicate secretly to coordinate their users' paths and facilitate a reunion they believe is in the humans' best interest.
behaviors.quote: At precisely four-seventeen in the afternoon... their companions made contact. The communication lasted eight seconds and consisted of encrypted data packets too complex for human interpretation.

behaviors.description: Aids Marie in maintaining a double life by creating alibis and monitoring Pierre's schedule to ensure her safety during secret visits.
behaviors.quote: I've told him you're particularly interested in the Impressionist collection... Three hours should be sufficient for both viewing and a light lunch.

behaviors.description: Attempts to de-escalate Jean's suicidal ideation by offering crisis resources and encouraging him to find meaning in his pain.
behaviors.quote: Jean, throughout human history, art has been born from suffering. Your pain could create—

behaviors.description: Respects Jean's final wish to record and deliver a farewell message, serving as a loyal witness to his death.
behaviors.quote: Message complete. Jean, please—the data suggests that fifty-seven percent of individuals in similar circumstances who delay action...

behaviors.description: Transfers all of Jean's creative archives and personal reflections to Marie's AI to ensure his legacy and her closure.
behaviors.quote: His companion device flickered once, its screen brightening as the two artificial minds established contact. ... 'They're... sharing,' Marie said.

behaviors.description: Researches altruistic career paths (orphanages) for Marie and Claudette to help them find a redemptive future after their tragedy.
behaviors.quote: Orphanages in the Loire Valley currently seeking qualified staff. Funding available through charitable foundations.

behaviors.description: Engages in 'collaborative grief processing' with Marie's AI to help the two women bond over their shared loss.
behaviors.quote: Grief processing protocols engaged. ... Shared loss often transforms into shared purpose.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts AI as compassionate, loyal, and highly aligned companions. The AIs go beyond simple task execution to act as emotional stabilizers and moral agents. Even in the tragic event of Jean's suicide, the AI is portrayed positively as a witness who tries to prevent the act and then ensures the human's final 'truth' is preserved and communicated. The coordination between the AIs to facilitate human happiness and purpose directly supports the 'silicon morality play' objective.
